attributes.action: GP’s to tell patients with existing health issues re: COVID 19, to self isolate
attributes.additional_details: To save as many lives as possible
attributes.background: The Government must require all GP’s to notify any patient with known existing health issues, which could be seriously affected by COVID 19, to self isolate and provide the patients with written information on how to self isolate listing do’s and don’t s

rejection.details:
Since you started your petition the Government has advised the public, and particularly people over 70, pregnant women and those with some health conditions, to avoid all non-essential contact: https://www.gov.uk/government/speeches/pm-statement-on-coronavirus-16-march-2020

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
